programmes.show_description: (1989) Fantasy horror with Julian Sands and Richard E Grant. Using magic, an evil warlock flees to 80s LA from the olde-worlde. Can he unmake creation before a witch-finder tracks him down?
(2019) Comedy slasher sequel with Jessica Rothe. Following the accidental creation of a time loop, our hero - Tree - has another murderer to stop. Déjà vu anyone?
Teleshopping.
Teleshopping.
(1958) Swashbuckling adventure starring June Laverick. Robin Hood is dead and his band of followers seek a worthy new leader. And they get one who exceeds all their expectations.
(2005) Comedy. Ben (Jimmy Fallon) must choose between his two loves: Lindsey (Drew Barrymore) and the Boston Red Sox baseball team. Based on Nick Hornby's novel Fever Pitch.
(2020) Touching adventure with Harrison Ford, based on Jack London's classic novel. A big, friendly hound finds himself unwittingly travelling across late 19th-century North America.
(1993) Comedy starring Robin Williams and Sally Field. A struggling actor dresses as a woman to get his estranged wife to hire him as a housekeeper, so he can spend more time with his kids.
(2022) Fact-based comedy starring Bryan Cranston and Annette Bening as a retired couple who find a way to exploit a lottery loophole. But then some rich kids try to muscle in...
Director Quentin Tarantino and stars Samuel L Jackson, Christoph Waltz, Jamie Foxx and Kerry Washington talk about making the western adventure set against a backdrop of slavery.
(2012) Quentin Tarantino's darkly comic, award-laden western with Jamie Foxx, Christopher Waltz, Leonardo DiCaprio and Samuel L Jackson. A freed slave searches for his wife... and revenge.
(2023) Unsettling found-footage horror with David Dastmalchian. A has-been host tries to save his 70s talk show using a demonically possessed 13-year-old girl. Really, what could go wrong?
(2023) Farcical time-loop comedy about the staff and guests at a remote mountain hotel condemned to repeat the same two minutes over, and over, and over, and over again. In Japanese/subs.
Teleshopping.
Teleshopping.
...Weapon: (1942) WWII spy adventure starring Basil Rathbone and Nigel Bruce. Sherlock Holmes and Doctor Watson attempt to prevent the Nazis from acquiring a revolutionary invention.
(1960) Fantasy adventure. Claude Rains plays a scientist who, convinced that dinosaurs still roam the earth, sets off into the Amazon to find them. Based on Sir Arthur Conan Doyle's novel.
(1997) Action thriller starring Pierce Brosnan and Linda Hamilton. The inhabitants of a volcano-side resort unwisely ignore a scientist's warning about its imminent eruption.
(2017) Fantasy adventure sequel with Dwayne Johnson, Karen Gillan, Kevin Hart and Jack Black. Four teenagers are sucked into the Jumanji video game to complete a dangerous quest.
(2016) Sci-fi blockbuster sequel starring Jeff Goldblum and Liam Hemsworth. Twenty years after Earth repelled a devastating alien invasion, the extraterrestrials return to finish the job.
(2022) Creepy-doll horror with Allison Williams. A robotics engineer simultaneously invents an AI dolly and takes on the care of her orphaned niece. But can a cyborg really raise a kid?
